mutants.code:
def is_palindrome(s):
    s = s.lower()
    s = ''.join((c for c in s if c.isalnum()))
    i = 1
    j = len(s) - 1
    while i < j:
        if s[i] != s[j]:
            return False
        i += 1
        j -= 1
    return True

            return False
        i += 1

    return True
